name: Knight's life
description:
"The king has put out a challenge for his Knights(player), everyone who accepts the challenge needs to hunt and slay as many monsters(point hitters) to count their haul for the day. They will embark on 3 quests(lives) and can only go on 3 quests. The highest count will receive the King’s blessing to marry the Princess. "

- Excerpt from the GDD

All background music from playonloop.com

Made by Group 7 of UTS GDS 2020
